function.name: get_server_info
function.description: Retrieve general information about the Couchbase Edge Server.

function.name: list_databases
function.description: List all databases (keyspaces) on the Couchbase Edge Server.

function.name: get_database_info
function.description: Get metadata about a specific database or keyspace.

keyspace.description: Name of the keyspace to retrieve info for

function.name: create_document
function.description: Create a new document in a keyspace with an auto-generated ID.

keyspace.description: The keyspace to insert the document into

function.name: get_document
function.description: Retrieve a document by its ID from a keyspace.

doc_id.description: The ID of the document to retrieve

function.name: upsert_document
function.description: Create or update a document with a specific ID in a keyspace.

doc_id.description: The document ID to create or update

function.name: delete_document
function.description: Delete a document from a keyspace using its ID and revision.

doc_id.description: The ID of the document to delete

rev.description: The revision ID of the document

function.name: run_query
function.description: Execute an ad-hoc SQL++ query against a keyspace.

keyspace.description: The keyspace context for the query

query.description: The SQL++ query string to run

function.name: get_changes
function.description: Retrieve the changes feed for a keyspace.

keyspace.description: The keyspace to fetch changes from

function.name: start_replication
function.description: Start a new replication process with the specified configuration.

replication_id.description: The unique ID for the replication

config.description: The replication configuration (source, target, continuous, etc.)

function.name: get_replication_status
function.description: Get the status of a specific replication process.

replication_id.description: The replication ID to check status for

function.name: stop_replication
function.description: Stop a replication process by its ID.

function.name: cert_path
function.description: Set or retrieve the TLS certificate file path for secure HTTPS communication with Couchbase Edge Server.

path.description: The file path to the PEM certificate used for TLS. If omitted, the current value will be returned.

function.name: create_certificate
function.description: Generate a TLS certificate and private key for Couchbase Edge Server using a common name (CN).

cn_expression.description: The Common Name (CN) to be used in the certificate, such as a domain name or IP address.

cert_path.description: The file path where the generated certificate (.pem) will be saved.

key_path.description: The file path where the private key (.key) will be saved.

function.name: add_user
function.description: Add a user to the Couchbase Edge Server users file. Optionally set role and password.

users_file.description: The path to the users file.

create.description: Whether to create the users file if it doesn't exist.

role.description: The role to assign to the user.

password.description: Password for the user (use only if you want to avoid password prompt; insecure).

function.name: create_certificate
function.description: Create a self-signed X.509 certificate and private key for testing Couchbase Edge Server.

hostname.description: The Common Name (CN), usually a domain or IP address.

certfile.description: The file path where the certificate (.pem) will be saved.

keyfile.description: The file path where the private key (.key) will be saved.

function.name: reset_uuid
function.description: Regenerate a Couchbase database file's UUID. Required after copying a DB file.

dbfile.description: The path to the database file.

function.name: get_version
function.description: Print the current Couchbase Edge Server version.
